      • urlDecode

        public static java.lang.String urlDecode(java.lang.String stringToDecode)
        Performs a safe decoding of the passed string, taking care to preserve each + character rather than replacing it with a space character.
        Parameters:
        stringToDecode - String value to decode
        Returns:
        the decoded string value
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the UTF-8 charset isn't supported

      • urlEncode

        public static java.lang.String urlEncode(java.lang.String stringToEncode)
        Performs a safe encoding of the specified string, taking care to insert %20 for each space character instead of inserting the + character.
        Parameters:
        stringToEncode - String value to encode
        Returns:
        the encoded string value
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the UTF-8 charset ins't supported

      • assertInBounds

        public static void assertInBounds(java.lang.String param,
                                  long value,
                                  long min,
                                  long max)
        Asserts that the specified number is in the valid range. The range is inclusive.
        Parameters:
        param - Name of the parameter
        value - Value of the parameter
        min - The minimum allowed value
        max - The maximum allowed value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If value is less than min or value is greater than max.

      • parseDate

        public static java.time.OffsetDateTime parseDate(java.lang.String dateString)
        Given a String representing a date in a form of the ISO8601 pattern, generates a Date representing it with up to millisecond precision.
        Parameters:
        dateString - the String to be interpreted as a Date
        Returns:
        the corresponding Date object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If dateString doesn't match an ISO8601 pattern

      • postProcessResponse

        public static <T> reactor.core.publisher.Mono<T> postProcessResponse(reactor.core.publisher.Mono<T> response,
                                                                     java.util.function.Function<reactor.core.publisher.Mono<T>,reactor.core.publisher.Mono<T>> errorWrapper)
        Wraps any potential error responses from the service and applies post processing of the response's eTag header to standardize the value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Value type of the response
        Parameters:
        response - Response from a service call
        errorWrapper - Error wrapping function that is applied to the response
        Returns:
        an updated response with post processing steps applied.

      • computeHMac256

        public static java.lang.String computeHMac256(java.lang.String base64Key,
                                              java.lang.String stringToSign)
        Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        base64Key - Base64 encoded key used to sign the string
        stringToSign - UTF-8 encoded string to sign
        Returns:
        the HMAC-SHA256 encoded signature
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm isn't support, if the key isn't a valid Base64 encoded string, or the UTF-8 charset isn't supported.

        public static java.net.URL appendToURLPath(java.net.URL baseURL,
                                           java.lang.String name)
        Appends a string to the end of the passed URL's path.
        Parameters:
        baseURL - URL having a path appended
        name - Name of the path
        Returns:
        a URL with the path appended.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If name causes the URL to become malformed.

      • stripLastPathSegment

        public static java.net.URL stripLastPathSegment(java.net.URL baseURL)
        Strips the last path segment from the passed URL.
        Parameters:
        baseURL - URL having its last path segment stripped
        Returns:
        a URL with the path segment stripped.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If stripping the last path segment causes the URL to become malformed or it doesn't contain any path segments.

      • getSharedKeyCredential

        Searches for a SharedKeyCredential in the passed HttpPipeline.
        Parameters:
        httpPipeline - Pipeline being searched
        Returns:
        a SharedKeyCredential if the pipeline contains one, otherwise null.
